message.content:
Based on the given lineage relationships, both Randy and Brandon are ancestors of Joseph. Brandon is an ancestor of Joseph through the chain: Brandon → William → Aaron → Walter → Julia → Charles → Andrew → Douglas → Wayne → Anthony → Nicole → David → Carol → Kenneth → Christian → Doris → Carl → Ann → Judy → Kelly → Kimberly → Nathan → Logan → Bradley → Roger → Matthew → Raymond → Donna → Jonathan → Karen → Hannah → Kevin → Sara → Rachel → Olivia → Mary → Richard → Anna → Christina → Nicholas → Michelle → Gregory → Linda → Janice → Gloria → Albert → Kayla → Joseph. Randy is an ancestor of Joseph through the chain: Randy → Jordan → Theresa → Eugene → Jessica → Pamela → Natalie → Marilyn → Samantha → Victoria → Zachary → Stephanie → Beverly → Sean → Nancy → Alexis → Joseph. Therefore, Randy and Brandon share a common descendant, Joseph.

<ANSWER>3</ANSWER>
